physical_appearance: This is a multicoloured painting of batik prints. Its composition comprises of repeated geometric patterns.
sgcool_label_text: This work continues Apinâ€™s investigations into the batik tradition in relation to its role in Indonesian art history.  This investigation started in the 1970s with his batik print works. The period also saw many modern Indonesian artists re-visiting traditional culture and mythology. Subsequently some would incorporate these elements into their visual language.
subject_terms_1: batik art  repeated motif  geometric patterns
subject_terms_2: Geometry in art Batik Reinterpreting history  Arts, Indonesian
